backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, access-controlled multi-photo upload, and per-user photo listing with pagination and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend source files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling authentication, profile loading, and routing between sign-in, profile setup, and home screens.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGrid.tsx: Responsive grid displaying photo thumbnails and emitting click events for viewer navigation.
frontend/src/components/PhotoViewer.tsx: Full-screen viewer with keyboard navigation and delete support for the current photo.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog prompting first-time users to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/UploadButton.tsx: Button component that handles image file selection, converts files to blobs, tracks upload progress, and triggers photo uploads with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout via a React context using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and photos, including uploads, deletions, and pagination.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/screens/HomeScreen.tsx: Main screen showing the photo grid, upload button, profile info, pagination, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/screens/SignInScreen.tsx: Login screen that prompts the user to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for getting URL parameters (including hash), storing and retrieving them from sessionStorage, and syncing URL params to persistent session values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, layout settings, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, implemented features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes for a mobile-first photo gallery app.
